PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-11522013-11-07,  ,  ,  NR, 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Late Filing Penalty — Prescribed Information Returns)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (LATE FILING PENALTY — PRESCRIBED INFORMATION RETURNS) in order to (1) add a subsection that lists the types of information returns that are subject to the graduated late-filing penalty; and (2) make the coming into force date of this amendment retroactive to January 1, 2012.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0199 Publication Date: 2013-11-20
AttachmentsAttachment
